title: Watch Face Red Art Inter
summary: Red Art Interactive version for: moto360 2 gen., TAG Heuer Connected, Sony SW3
developerAddress:
proizd Voenniy 6
Kherson, Khersons'ka oblast 73000
Ukraine
description: Watch face for smartwatches with:- Weather  widget and info (current day & 4 days forecast)- steps counter ( "Steps "A");- second steps counter "Steps "B";- switch steps/meters measurement;- set the level of steps (goal) per day (if not using Google Fit);- "Night mode" (with custom start/stop time);- custom setup for Ambient mode with brightness text/icons and on/off indicators;- battery level(watch/smartphone);- missed Calls and SMS counters;- smartphone status: Ringer (silent/vibro) and Connections (WiFi/Mobile data);- launcher smartphone apps from smartwatch; - built-in Calendar;- week number;- Stopwatch with Tachymeter;- second time "Time2" (GMT timelines);- selected backgrounds.Working fine on oldest and newest models on any screen (round/square).Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.Configuration supported languages- English- Español- Français- Deutsch- Nederlands- Italiano- Português- Русский- 日本の- 中文 （繁體）Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face for smartwatches with:

- Weather widget and info (current day & 4 days forecast)
- steps counter ( "Steps "A");
- second steps counter "Steps "B";
- switch steps/meters measurement;
- set the level of steps (goal) per day (if not using Google Fit);
- "Night mode" (with custom start/stop time);
- custom setup for Ambient mode with brightness text/icons and on/off indicators;
- battery level(watch/smartphone);
- missed Calls and SMS counters;
- smartphone status: Ringer (silent/vibro) and Connections (WiFi/Mobile data);
- launcher smartphone apps from smartwatch;
- built-in Calendar;
- week number;
- Stopwatch with Tachymeter;
- second time "Time2" (GMT timelines);
- selected backgrounds.

Working fine on oldest and newest models on any screen (round/square).
Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Español
- Français
- Deutsch
- Nederlands
- Italiano
- Português
- Русский
- 日本の
- 中文 （繁體）


Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
comments: It really like this watchface on my Sony SW3, but after recent updates it stops much of the time and will not run, leaving my watch with nothing but the simple blue sky face. Please fix this...
